responseText: Take care of those tender tootsies, friend! These mountains are rocky enough, but it gets cold up here too! You'll be glad of a nice pair of boots if you get over to the Leatherworking Station and get them made! I'll be here to check your work when you've finished.
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_Artisan_Leatherworking_Zanai_7_Response
